posts.post_content:
Looking to add a nice-for-grade PSA2/3 HOF T206 for an office display.  Good eye appeal is desired, no qualifiers, nice centering for grade, etc.

Budget this month $300, to include Priority shipping with tracking.

Plan to add new cards periodically with varying budget amounts.

Please send front/rear scans to [url]arkansas2014@gmail.com[/url].

Thanks in advance ..... Steve
